cast.name: 阿尔图尔·别夏斯特内 Artur Beschastny
阿列克谢·马斯洛杜多夫 Aleksey Maslodudov

introduction: After a chance meeting with a girl, a nameless boy becomes her lover and guardian angel. Together they avenge the girl’s rape, fleeing into the woods in an attempt to escape the modern world and civilization. They commit more crimes, killing encountered people at random, until the third character comes into the story, changing the dynamic of the lovers’ relationship. It’s an emotional story of passion, violence and the impossibility of running away from oneself.
